home.headline: Fullstack Developer With A Passion For UX/UI Design
home.intro: Hello!!!, I'm delighted you've visited my website. I'm an "Everythings" developer with over 3 years of practical experience gained at FPT Software. Feel free to browse through the other pages and discover more about me!
home.cta.opportunities: I'm open to discussing new projects and innovative ideas at any time. Please present your requirements, and let me explore how I can become a part of your vision.
